section.title: Introduction

p.strong: This is a draft of the January–March 2015 status report. Please check back after it is finalized, and an announcement email is sent to the &os;-Announce mailing list.

section.p: This report covers &os;-related projects between January and March 2015. This is the first of four reports planned for 2015.
The first quarter of 2015... was a very busy and productive time.
Thanks to all the reporters for the excellent work!
The deadline for submissions covering the period from April to June 2015 is July 7th, 2015.
